reviewText: Why O Why is this film not available in the USA in USA format.  It is a tremendous movie and would sell very well as so many people love the movie.  A GREAT family movie.  Please O Please get it back in stock.

reviewerName: J. C. Gordon "Movie watcher and book lover"
reviewText: I saw this movie on t.v. and am sad that it is not available on dvd for the viewers. I really enjoyed them and there is an Au Pair 3 coming out soon. Please, pretty please get this out for us again. I am a movie fan and have a few thousand movies that we have collected. We would love to own all three movies when they do ocme out. e-mail me at [..] if you want to chat. thanks.

reviewText: I remember watching this TV movie when it came out in 1999.  I loved it!  I looked here at amazon and wanted to purchase it, but noticed that it is no longer being manufactured.  I am hoping that after tonight's premiere of Au Pair III that it will be available again.
